StatDef.label: sights efficiency
StatDef.description:
How good the sights on this weapon are. Quality sights reduce range errors and improve target leading. This is multiplied against the aiming accuracy of the shooter to calculate the amount of range and lead error.

The final modifier is calculated via this formula:
(1.5 - aiming accuracy) / aiming efficiency

Lead error is calculated by multiplying this factor against total lead distance in cells. Range error is calculated by multiplying it against the total distance to the target divided by 4.

StatDef.label: One-handed weapon
StatDef.description: Whether or not the weapon can be used with shields

StatDef.label: Additional weapon info
StatDef.description: Information about under/over barrel or otherwise mounted weapons

StatDef.label: spread
StatDef.description: Inherent projectile spread. This represents the inherent inaccuracy of the gun and causes random conical deviation that is not influenced by skill.

StatDef.label: weapon sway
StatDef.description:
How difficult the gun is to keep steady. 

The total sway is calculated as:
(4.5 - shooting accuracy) * weapon sway factor

Aiming accuracy influences the sway reduction during aimed shots. For example, at 75% aiming accuracy sway will be reduced to 25%.

StatDef.label: muzzle flash
StatDef.description:
How bright the muzzle flash is.

Muzzle flashes will illuminate a shooter's position in darkness, exposing them to more accurate return fire. Brighter muzzle flashes are easier to target.

Pawns will remember the position of the muzzle flash for 5-10 seconds.

StatDef.label: caliber
StatDef.description: The types of ammo this gun accepts.

StatDef.label: Bipod stats
StatDef.description: Stats with bipod deployed and undeployed.

StatDef.label: fire rate

StatDef.label: burst shot count
StatDef.description: How many projectiles this weapon launch in one burst.

StatDef.label: recoil amount
StatDef.description: How much will this weapon recoil upon firing.

StatDef.label: magazine capacity
StatDef.description: How many projectiles this weapon's magazine holds and how long it takes to reload it.

StatDef.label: reload time
StatDef.description: How long should this weapon take to reload.

StatDef.label: ammo consumed per shot
StatDef.description: How many units of ammunition this gun consumes for each individual shot.\n\nThis applies to guns with multiple barrels that fire simultaneously with each pull of the trigger, or exotic energy weapons that use up different amounts of energy from a power cell.

StatDef.label: ammo generation per magazine override
StatDef.description: How many units of ammunition per magazine specified in pawnKindDef should a pawn bring.\n\nPurely used in pawn generation. You should not be able to read this in game.
